titleStmt.title: A description of the sands, shoals, buoyes, beacons, roads, channels, and sea marks on the coast of England from the southforeland to Flamborough head, being furnished with new & exact droughts of the sands, acording to the said descriptions / by John Seller, hydrographer to the Kings most excellent Majestie, and are to be sold by him at the Hermitage staires in Wapping.
titleStmt.author: Seller, John, fl. 1658-1698.

notesStmt.note: Publisher and date suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
